text: Zvirokwazvo, mubairo weavo vanoronga hondo kupokana naAllah nemutumwa wavo (Muhammad (SAW)) nekuita zvakaipa munyika ndewekuti vauraiwe, kana kukomererwa pamichinjikwa, kana kuti maoko avo netsoka dzavo zvigurwe kubva kumativi akasiyana, kana kuti vadzingwe munyika. Ndiko kunyadziswa kwavo munyika ino, uye marwadzo makuru achange ari avo muhupenyu hwemangwana
